timelapse.changes:
2.1.0.4: - Various bug fixes and feature cleanup - Options dialog: can set rapidity of navigating image sequences - Date correction dialogs improved From Previous release - Video files (.avi, .mpg) now supported (.avi, .mpg) --- see the Video Player - New organization of images: --- images can be stored in sub-folders --- image subfolders can be added at any time --- RelativePath field stores subfolder location - Myriads of interface changes and bug fixes - User manual updated
To see other version history details, select Help/About and click the Version History button.
